Queries.AdminNameConfirm: SELECT admin_id FROM Administrator WHERE admin_name = '{admin_name}'
Queries.AdminLogin: SELECT * FROM Administrator WHERE admin_name = '{admin_name}' AND password = '{password}'
Queries.ChangePwdAd: UPDATE Administrator SET password = '{new_password}' WHERE admin_id = '{admin_id}'
Queries.AllODReserve: SELECT R.*, B.book_name, B.author FROM Reserve R JOIN Book B ON R.book_id = B.book_id WHERE R.message = '逾期未取'
Queries.AllODBorrow: SELECT R.*, B.book_name, B.author FROM BorrowRecord R JOIN Book B ON R.book_id = B.book_id WHERE R.message = '逾期未还'
Queries.ISBNConfirm: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Book WHERE ISBN = '{ISBN}'
Queries.InsertBk: INSERT INTO Book (book_id, num, ISBN, book_name, author, introduction, collection_type) VALUES (book_id_seq.nextval, 0, '{ISBN}', '{book_name}', '{author}', '{introduction}', '{collection_type}')
Queries.UpdateBk: UPDATE Book SET book_name = '{book_name}', ISBN = '{ISBN}', author = '{author}', introduction = '{introduction}', collection_type = '{collection_type}' WHERE book_id = '{book_id}'
Queries.CheckSupplierExistence: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name = '{supplier_name}'
Queries.CheckCollectionTypeExistence: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CollectionType WHERE collection_type = '{collection_type}'
Queries.InsertSupplier: INSERT INTO Supplier (supplier_id, supplier_name, phone_number, email, address) VALUES (supplier_id_seq.nextval, '{supplier_name}', '{phone_number}', '{email}', '{address}')
Queries.BookConfirm: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Book WHERE book_id = '{book_id}'
Queries.InsertPurchaseRecord: INSERT INTO PurchaseRecord (purchase_id, admin_id, supplier_id, book_id, purchase_date, quantity, unit_price, total_price, is_approved) VALUES (purchase_id_seq.nextval, {admin_id}, {supplier_id}, {book_id}, '{purchase_date}', {quantity}, {unit_price}, {total_price}, {is_approved})
Queries.AllPurchaseRecord: SELECT P.*, B.book_name FROM PurchaseRecord P JOIN Book B ON P.book_id = B.book_id WHERE P.supplier_id = '{supplier_id}'
